BANK_DEPOSIT_ALL.description: Deposits all items in the inventory into the bank

BANK_DEPOSIT_ALL_EXCEPT.description: Deposits all items in the inventory except those matching the filter

BANK_DEPOSIT_ITEM.description: Deposits a specific item from inventory into the bank

CHECK_BANK_VALUE.description: Checks the total value of items in the bank

IF_BANK_PIN_IS_SET.description: Conditional that checks if a bank PIN is set

IF_BANK_PIN_IS_NOT_SET.description: Conditional that checks if a bank PIN is not set

BANK_WITHDRAW_ITEM.description: Withdraws a specific item from the bank into inventory

BANK_WITHDRAW_ALL.description: Withdraws all items matching the filter from bank

OPEN_BANK.description: Opens the bank by interacting with a bank object

CLOSE_BANK.description: Closes the bank if it's open

IF_BANK_IS_OPEN.description: Conditional that checks if the bank is open

IF_BANK_IS_NOT_OPEN.description: Conditional that checks if the bank is not open

IF_BANK_CONTAINS.description: Conditional that checks if the bank contains an item

BANK_CONTAINS_AMOUNT_OF_ITEM.description: Conditional that checks if the bank contains a specific amount of an item

AND_BRANCH.description: Logical AND operation that executes child actions only if all conditions are true

OR_BRANCH.description: Logical OR operation that executes child actions if any condition is true

IF_VARIABLE_IS_SET.description: Conditional that checks if a variable is set

IF_VARIABLE_IS_NOT_SET.description: Conditional that checks if a variable is not set

SET_VARIABLE.description: Sets a variable to a specified value

SET_VARIABLE_TO_CURRENT_TIME.description: Sets a variable to the current system time

CREATE_TIMER.description: Creates a named timer with specified duration

IF_TIMER_IS_FINISHED.description: Conditional that checks if a timer has expired

IF_RANDOM_NUMBER_IS.description: Conditional that checks if a random number meets criteria

IF_INVENTORY_CONTAINS.description: Conditional that checks if the inventory contains an item

IF_INVENTORY_IS_FULL.description: Conditional that checks if the inventory is full

IF_INVENTORY_IS_NOT_FULL.description: Conditional that checks if the inventory is not full

IF_INVENTORY_IS_EMPTY.description: Conditional that checks if the inventory is empty

IF_INVENTORY_IS_NOT_EMPTY.description: Conditional that checks if the inventory is not empty

INVENTORY_DROP_ITEM.description: Drops an item from the inventory

INVENTORY_DROP_ALL.description: Drops all items in the inventory

INVENTORY_DROP_ALL_EXCEPT.description: Drops all items except those matching the filter

INVENTORY_USE_ITEM.description: Uses an item in the inventory

WALK_TO_TILE.description: Walks to a specific tile on the map

IF_POSITION_IS_REACHABLE.description: Conditional that checks if a specific position is reachable

IF_PLAYER_IS_MOVING.description: Conditional that checks if the player is moving

examples.description: Enable running if it's not already enabled.

SET_RUNNING_ON.notes: Activates player run mode when sufficient run energy is available.

SET_RUNNING_OFF.description: Disables running mode to preserve run energy.
SET_RUNNING_OFF.notes: Useful in long-distance paths where energy conservation is desired.

SLEEP_BETWEEN.description: Pauses script execution for a random duration between min and max milliseconds

WAIT_RANDOM_INTERVAL.description: Waits for a random interval between defined min and max milliseconds

SLEEP_NORMAL_DISTRIBUTION.description: Pauses script execution for a duration following normal distribution

NPC_INTERACT.description: Interacts with an NPC in the game world

IF_NPC_EXISTS.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC exists in the game world

GAME_OBJECT_INTERACT.description: Interacts with a game object in the world

IF_GAME_OBJECT_EXISTS.description: Conditional that checks if a game object exists in the world

GROUND_ITEM_INTERACT.description: Interacts with an item on the ground

IF_GROUND_ITEM_EXISTS.description: Conditional that checks if an item exists on the ground

IF_IN_COMBAT.description: Conditional that checks if the player is in combat

IF_NOT_IN_COMBAT.description: Conditional that checks if the player is not in combat

IF_LOCAL_PLAYER_HEALTH_PERCENTAGE.description: Conditional that checks player's health percentage

IF_LOGGED_IN.description: Conditional that checks if the player is logged in

IF_LOGGED_OUT.description: Conditional that checks if the player is logged out

IF_WIDGET_IS_VISIBLE.description: Conditional that checks if a specific widget is visible

IF_WIDGET_IS_DISABLED.description: Conditional that checks if a widget is disabled

IF_WIDGET_IS_ENABLED.description: Conditional that checks if a specific widget is enabled

ADD_TO_LIST.description: Adds a value to a list

REMOVE_FROM_LIST.description: Removes a value from a list

IF_LIST_CONTAINS.description: Conditional that checks if a list contains a value

MERGE_LISTS.description: Merge multiple lists into a single consolidated list.

examples.description: Merge loot and alch item lists

FOR_EACH.description: Executes child actions for each item in a list

ROTATE_CAMERA_RANDOMLY.description: Rotates the game camera to a random angle

IF_NPC_VISIBLE_ON_SCREEN.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is visible on screen

IF_NPC_NOT_VISIBLE_ON_SCREEN.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is not visible on screen

IF_NPC_IS_INTERACTABLE.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is interactable

IF_NPC_IS_NOT_INTERACTABLE.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is not interactable

IF_NPC_IS_ATTACKABLE.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is attackable

IF_NPC_IS_NOT_ATTACKABLE.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is not attackable

IF_NPC_IS_VISIBLE.description: Conditional that checks if an NPC is visible

EXAMINE_RANDOM_NPC.description: Examines a random NPC in the vicinity

IF_FIRST_RUN.description: Conditional that is true only on the first execution of the script

WHILE_INVENTORY_IS_NOT_FULL.description: Loop that continues while the inventory is not full

WHILE_BANK_IS_OPEN.description: Loop that continues while the bank is open

IF_DISTANCE_TO_CLOSEST_BANK_IS.description: Conditional that checks the distance to the closest bank

WALK_FULLY_TO_NEAREST_BANK_WITH_TELEPORT.description: Walks to the nearest bank using teleports if available

IF_POISONED.description: Conditional that checks if the player is poisoned

IF_TIME_ELAPSED.description: Conditional that checks if a specified time has elapsed

IF_GROUND_ITEM_STACK_GREATER_THAN.description: Conditional that checks if a ground item's stack is greater than a certain amount

IF_GROUND_ITEM_STACK_LESS_THAN.description: Conditional that checks if a ground item's stack is less than a certain amount

IF_DRINK_POTION.description: Drinks a specified potion from the inventory

IF_FOOD_IN_INVENTORY.description: Conditional that checks if food exists in the player's inventory

IF_INVENTORY_HAS_NOTED_ITEM.description: Conditional that checks if inventory contains a noted item

IF_INVENTORY_HAS_ITEM.description: Conditional that checks if inventory contains an item

IF_INVENTORY_HAS_ITEM_WITH_QUANTITY.description: Conditional that checks if inventory contains an item with a certain quantity

IF_INVENTORY_HAS_ITEM_WITH_QUANTITY_OR_M.description: Conditional that checks if inventory contains an item with a certain quantity or more

EQUIP_WEAPON.description: Equips a specified weapon from the inventory

IF_PRAYER_POINTS_BELOW.description: Conditional that checks if prayer points are below a certain threshold
